desc: Allay's patented narrow band of green light is uniquely soothing to your eyes and brain, even when you're most sensitive to light. Discovered by a Harvard Medical School neuroscientist, Allay's precise light is calming during a migraine - or any time - helping you get back to reading, working, and being yourself.

layout.text:
Meet the Light of
Your Dreams

Allay's patented glow naturally soothes the brain to help you
focus on your work.
